about_the_game:
Welcome to House of Jigsaw: Happy Puzzling, Happy Home an immersive world of puzzling delights that will leave you captivated and craving for more. This free-to-play game offers a treasure trove of Jigsaws, with the option to enhance your experience through exciting DLC packs.

🏠 Your Home for Puzzling Adventures
Once you step into the House of Jigsaw, you'll find yourself right at home. The relaxing gameplay and the promise of ever more challenging puzzles will keep you coming back for more. Bid farewell to boredom and say hello to a world of captivating challenges. Immerse yourself in a seamless and user-friendly interface designed for maximum enjoyment.

🌟 Endless Hours of Free Fun
Play a vast number of puzzles without any cost. House of Jigsaw offers a treasure trove of entertainment completely free. Immerse yourself in a world of captivating puzzles without spending a penny.

🧩 A Diverse Array of Puzzles Await
Embark on an exhilarating journey through a great collection of jigsaw puzzles. From the finest art to awesome vehicles, House of Jigsaw presents a diverse array of jigsaws designed to keep you engaged and entertained for hours on end.

💼 Explore Packs of Puzzles
Indulge your inner puzzle enthusiast with themed packs that promise an immersive experience. Whether you're drawn to the mystique of ancient artifacts or the thrill of outer space, House of Jigsaw has many DLC packs tailored to your interests.

🌌 An Experience Like No Other
Play House of Jigsaw now and embark on a journey that will capture your imagination and keep you hooked from the very first puzzle. With the option to expand your adventure through DLC packs, you'll have access to a world of puzzle-solving possibilities that will leave you craving for more.



  • Free Fun for Hours
  • Cutouts up to 1000 pieces
  • Different edge cutouts
  • A Diverse Array of HD puzzles
  • Incredible zoom functionality
  • Save any level
  • Monthly new puzzles

Join the community of puzzle enthusiasts and immerse yourself in the ultimate puzzle adventure that is House of Jigsaw!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 900 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard supporting DirectX 9 compatible
  • Sound Card: Any
